page.title: 16Clubs For Adults,Sellindge
page.content: There is a flourishing W.I.(Women's Institute) whose current president is Mrs.Freda Clarke.There are 30 members who meet on the 2nd Wednesday of each month in the Village Hall.After discussing important business,they have a speaker followed by refreshments and general socialising. Theatre trips,outings and a Harvest Supper are also organised during the year. The Gardener's Club has over 80 members and is the most popular club in the village.They too meet in the Village Hall,but on the 3rd Wednesday each month.The Chairman is Mr.John Ward.Each year there are 2 shows,a small one in June and the main one in August when 10 to 20 cups are to be won for classes of fruit,flowers and vegetables.Both of these shows are held in the Village Hall.
